evidence.claim: Revert Systems utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure to ensure scalability and reliability.
The company adheres to HIPAA guidelines in its health tech solutions, ensuring data protection.
Revert Systems supports HL7 FHIR for health data exchange.
Integration patterns include using API-driven connectivity for data sharing.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence found regarding X12 transactions or clearinghouse functionalities.
